attributes.action: ensure that British Dairy Farmers achieve a good price for their milk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need to put pressure on British supermarkets to pay farmers a good price for their milk. They are holding the farmers to ransom. British farmers work 7 days a week to ensure a superb product that we all use every day.
Cheap imports are making farmers bankrupt.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
